display_long_description:
# THE 1ˢᵗ SCI-FI LIVE-ACTION FILM to be released in the VR IMMERSIVE CINEMA FORMAT (8K 180VR-3D)
# Chapter One (30mins) in a series coming later this year
-Try a new **Premium VR Video Narrative Experience**! See our app reviews for audience reaction & enjoyment.



**The Talent Stealer™ is an Award-Winning & Spectacular Sci-Fi Action-Thriller that achieves NEW LEVELS of Entertainment and Sophistication in VR Filmmaking - with an incredible concept & story in the vein of The Matrix, Inception, X-Men and Nikita:**

[media]

.

At a secret facility called The Maxstein Institute, a group of students are controlled & trained to master their special memory & skill-stealing abilities by a shadowy organization with morally ambiguous goals. One student is singled out for her extraordinary power, and finds herself in a fight for her freedom and sanity from those that wish to control her

**Starring performers Breanna Watkins (Predator, Sonic) and Jared Payne (The Last of Us S2)**

.
[media]
[media]






- Specially designed to combine elements of 2D Cinema with the new 3D-180 Immersive Video format, you can truly feel like you have "stepped inside" a Hollywood movie for the **VERY FIRST TIME** - experiencing Cinema standards of lighting, VFX and editing for a complex narrative story flow and "little to no" motion sickness

[media]


***COMING SOON CHAPTER TRAILER INCLUDED!**

*Contains flashing lights scenes not suitable for photosensitive viewers

The Talent Stealer™ copyright 2022 

.


**2023 - LA Film Awards VR WINNER**
,**Cinequest FINALIST**, **Victoria Film Festival**

**2022 FIVARS**






[media]
[media]
